ing: 1 large bell pepper, cut into bite-sized pieces
des:
"Red, juicy tomatoes fresh from the garden join fresh bell peppers in this oh-so-EASY side dish! Goes well with crusty bread, to 'dip' in the juices!
"
ins: Combine tomatoes and bell pepper in a large bowl. Pour in the olive oil; stir gently to coat the vegetables.  Sprinkle with the oregano and garlic salt to taste. Cover, and refrigerate before serving.
